title: Primitives
summary: The primitives represent the fundamental parts of the design system like colors, typography, spacing, and sizing. This ensures consistency across the entire design system.

columns.text: Based on our brand colors, we have developed a comprehensive palette of tints for each one. These extended palettes allow for greater versatility and nuance, ensuring consistency and depth across all visual elements.

Typography plays a crucial role in shaping the look and feel of our design. It not only impacts readability but also helps establish a consistent visual identity, guiding users through content with clarity and hierarchy.
By maintaining consistency in typography, we create a cohesive user experience that enhances communication, reinforces brand identity, and improves overall design aesthetics.
Our typography guidelines outline how to use font styles, sizes,  and weights effectively across different elements, from headings  and body text to small UI details.
Icons are small symbols that help users quickly identify actions and categories. In Green, we use the Central Icon System by Iconist.
These icons are designed on a 24x24 px grid with a 2 px safe area, resulting in a 20x20 px live area for optimal clarity and balance.
